original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Uzzah, and he struck him down because he put out his hand to the ark, and he died there before God.
korean_text: 웃사가 손을 펴서 궤를 붙듦으로 말미암아 여호와께서 진노하사 치시매 그가 거기 하나님 앞에서 죽으니라

sentences.original_text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Uzzah
because he put out his hand to the ark
and he died there before God
